2016-02-22-kegais-gaspard-bucher.title: Kegais.
2016-02-22-kegais-gaspard-bucher.description: Kegais is a word in a language that Gaspard Bucher is currently working on. This identity replaces Gaspard Buma (gaspardbuma.org) and bumagy (buma.gy). The websites for previous identities will be closed and archived.
